description: The Action actor is an activity that took place and was recorded by the agent.

fields.name: action_app_id_transitions
fields.description: List of application ID transitions.

fields.name: action_boot_instance_cleanup_required
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the agent can clean up open instances from a previous computer restart.

fields.name: action_boot_time
fields.description: Computer boot time in ms since epoch time.

fields.name: action_country
fields.description: The destination country of network connections, which is based on the remote IP and GeoLocation enrichment.

fields.name: action_device_bus_type
fields.description: For the action, the origin of the device bus type (USB).

fields.name: action_device_class_guid
fields.description: Device setup class GUID.

fields.name: action_device_class_name
fields.description: Device setup class internal friendly name.

fields.name: action_device_usb_port_connectable
fields.description: Indicates whether or not a user can connect to the USB port that the device is connected to.

fields.name: action_device_usb_product_id
fields.description: USB device product ID.

fields.name: action_device_usb_serial_number
fields.description: USB device serial number.

fields.name: action_device_usb_vendor_id
fields.description: USB vendor ID.

fields.name: action_download
fields.description: Number of downloaded bytes in the last window of time.

fields.name: action_evtlog_data_fields
fields.description: Event log data fields in a JSON array.

fields.name: action_evtlog_description
fields.description: Event log description.

fields.name: action_evtlog_event_id
fields.description: Event log event ID.

fields.name: action_evtlog_level
fields.description: Event log severity level.

fields.name: action_evtlog_message
fields.description: Event log message field - summary of the event.

fields.name: action_evtlog_opcode
fields.description: Event provider specific information, usually similar to action_evtlog_level.

fields.name: action_evtlog_pid
fields.description: Process ID given in the event-log event.

fields.name: action_evtlog_provider_guid
fields.description: Provider GUID

fields.name: action_evtlog_provider_name
fields.description: Windows: Provider name, such as Service Control Manager. Linux: The file from which this event originated.

fields.name: action_evtlog_record_id
fields.description: Unique ID of this event-log record in the computer's event-log.

fields.name: action_evtlog_source
fields.description: Method used to get the event log.

fields.name: action_evtlog_tid
fields.description: Thread ID given in the event-log event.

fields.name: action_evtlog_uid
fields.description: User ID given in the event-log event.

fields.name: action_evtlog_username
fields.description: User ID translation of username.

fields.name: action_evtlog_version
fields.description: Version of the event log record (private to provider/channel).

fields.name: action_external_hostname
fields.description: The hostname the endpoint connects to. When there is a proxy connection, this value will differ from action_remote_ip.

fields.name: action_external_port
fields.description: The external port of the initiated communication. When there is a proxy connection, this value can differ from action_remote_port.

fields.name: action_file_access_time
fields.description: The action file access timestamp.

fields.name: action_file_archive_list
fields.description: Only valid if the file is a ZIP file and the event collection is enabled in the policy.

fields.name: action_file_attributes
fields.description: Windows: Bitmask of FILE_ATTRIBUTE_* attributes, which is only relevant for some subtypes. Unix: Always 'null'.

fields.name: action_file_authenticode_sha1
fields.description: SHA-1 (Secure Hash Algorithm 1) of the file signature authenticode.

fields.name: action_file_authenticode_sha2
fields.description: SHA-2 (Secure Hash Algorithm 2) of the file signature authenticode.

fields.name: action_file_create_time
fields.description: The action file create timestamp.

fields.name: action_file_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: action_file_device_type
fields.description: Windows: An enum representing the device type for this file. Regular file = 0, Named pipe = 1

fields.name: action_file_dir_query
fields.description: The query string given to the 'query directory' operation.

fields.name: action_file_dirty_reason
fields.description: Only valid for sub_type = 6 (write) when a non-null file_size is provided. Indicates the reason this 'final' write was issued and why the file hash was recalculated.

fields.name: action_file_extension
fields.description: File extension of action_file_path.

fields.name: action_file_group
fields.description: Linux & MacOS: The new group of the file (user_id).

fields.name: action_file_group_name
fields.description: Name assigned to action_file_group (username).

fields.name: action_file_hash_control_verdict
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_id
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_info_company
fields.description: Company listed in the file information section of the file.

fields.name: action_file_info_description
fields.description: Description listed in the file information section of the file.

fields.name: action_file_info_file_version
fields.description: File version listed in the file information section of the file.

fields.name: action_file_info_product_name
fields.description: Product name listed in the file information section of the file.

fields.name: action_file_info_product_version
fields.description: Production version listed in the file information section of the file.

fields.name: action_file_internal_meta_data
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_internal_zipped_files
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_md5
fields.description: The action file hash value in MD5.

fields.name: action_file_mod_time
fields.description: The action file modification timestamp.

fields.name: action_file_mode
fields.description: A representation of the standard UNIX file permissions mask.

fields.name: action_file_name
fields.description: The file name of action_file_path, which is an empty string for directory operations.

fields.name: action_file_new_file_for_loaded_dll
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_original_event_id
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_owner
fields.description: The new owner of the file according to the user_id.

fields.name: action_file_owner_name
fields.description: The new owner of the file according to the username.

fields.name: action_file_path
fields.description: The path of the file in use.

fields.name: action_file_prev_type
fields.description: Before the current write, the previous file type, which is based only on the content of the file. This information can be used to detect header changes. Will be valid ONLY on the file_write event that changes the file type. Windows only

fields.name: action_file_previous_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: action_file_previous_file_extension
fields.description: File extension of 'action_file_previous_file_path'.

fields.name: action_file_previous_file_name
fields.description: File name of 'action_file_previous_file_path', which is an empty string for directory operations.

fields.name: action_file_previous_file_path
fields.description: The previous path of the file in use.

fields.name: action_file_remote_file_host
fields.description: This is valid when Cortex XDR/XSIAM accesses a file on a remote computer. This means Cortex XDR/XSIAM is the client.

fields.name: action_file_remote_file_ip
fields.description: This is valid when a remote computer accesses a file on this endpoint. This means Cortex XDR/XSIAM is the client. The remote IP can also be a loopback (127.0.0.1 or ::1).

fields.name: action_file_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: action_file_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: action_file_reparse_path
fields.description: Only valid for sub_type = 1/2 (create_new/open). Provides the reparse path if the file was opened through a reparse point.

fields.name: action_file_sec_desc
fields.description: Windows: Security descriptor of the file in SDDL.

fields.name: action_file_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: action_file_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: action_file_signature_status
fields.description: The signature status of the file in use.

fields.name: action_file_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: action_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file undergoing the process in bytes.

fields.name: action_file_suspicious_strings_bitmap
fields.description: Bitmap of suspicious strings found in file content.

fields.name: action_file_type
fields.description: Partial file type recognizer.

fields.name: action_file_type_changedaction_file_id
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_file_wildfire_verdict
fields.description: DEPRECATED

fields.name: action_firewall_direction
fields.description: Outbound (1), Inbound (2)

fields.name: action_firewall_local_ip
fields.description: The local IP address in the communication.

fields.name: action_firewall_local_port
fields.description: The local port in the communication.

fields.name: action_firewall_protocol
fields.description: The IP protocol number as specified in RFC 1700.

fields.name: action_firewall_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: action_firewall_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: action_is_dll_injection
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the action is a DLL Injection.

fields.name: action_is_injected_thread
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the action was performed by an injected thread.

fields.name: action_local_ip
fields.description: Source IP address.

fields.name: action_local_ip_int
fields.description: Source IP in integer format.

fields.name: action_local_port
fields.description: Source port

fields.name: action_local_nat_ip
fields.description: Source NAT IP address.

fields.name: action_local_nat_port
fields.description: Source NAT port.

fields.name: action_remote_nat_ip
fields.description: Destination NAT IP address.

fields.name: action_remote_nat_port
fields.description: Destination NAT port.

fields.name: action_nat
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the connection is NAT.

fields.name: action_module_base_address
fields.description: The base address where the library was loaded.

fields.name: action_module_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: action_module_file_access_time
fields.description: Program Executable (PE) metadata collection from the image itself

fields.name: action_module_file_create_time
fields.description: Program Executable (PE) metadata collection from the image itself

fields.name: action_module_file_info
fields.description: Program Executable (PE) metadata collection from the image itself

fields.name: action_module_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modified time of the file in the module.

fields.name: action_module_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file of the process in bytes.

fields.name: action_module_image_size
fields.description: Size of the file in virtual memory.

fields.name: action_module_is_remote
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the module is loaded from a remote process.

fields.name: action_module_is_replay
fields.description: All existing loaded images are replayed, when the agent starts. This is set to true for images loaded when the agent is not started yet.

fields.name: action_module_md5
fields.description: The module md5 value.

fields.name: action_module_other_load_location
fields.description: This module was already loaded before from a different location. This is the other location.

fields.name: action_module_path
fields.description: The path of the module in use.

fields.name: action_module_process_instance_id
fields.description: Cortex instance ID of the process loading the module.

fields.name: action_module_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the loaded module.

fields.name: action_module_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: action_module_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: action_module_signature_status
fields.description: The signature status of the module in action.

fields.name: action_module_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: action_module_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Instance ID of the actor that wrote the file for the module.

fields.name: action_module_code_integrity
fields.description: The value of ci!g_CiOptions when the driver is loaded.

fields.name: action_module_boot_code_integrity
fields.description: The value of ci!g_CiOptions at boot time.

fields.name: action_module_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the PE or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: action_module_system_properties
fields.description: Addition properties of the DLL.

fields.name: action_module_auth_sha2
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_module_auth_sha1
fields.description: SHA1 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_network_connection_id
fields.description: The ID of the network connection.

fields.name: action_network_creation_time
fields.description: The start time of the network session.

fields.name: action_network_http
fields.description: HTTP headers

fields.name: action_network_is_ipv6
fields.description: Indicates whether or not action_remote_ip is an IPv6 endpoint.

fields.name: action_network_is_npcap
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this action is an npcap event.

fields.name: action_network_is_server
fields.description: True for incoming connections. False for outgoing ones.

fields.name: action_network_packet_data
fields.description: The data is converted to hexadecimal. Each byte is converted to 2 characters representing the character value of the byte.

fields.name: action_network_protocol
fields.description: Internet protocol number based on IPPROTO or normalized to IPPROTO (same as Java).

fields.name: action_network_stats_is_last
fields.description: True, if the connection was terminated, and false otherwise.

fields.name: action_network_stats_seq
fields.description: Sequence number of the statistics 'packet'.

fields.name: action_network_success
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the session was successful.

fields.name: action_network_icmp_data
fields.description: Only valid for event_sub_type = 18. ICMP packet data.

fields.name: action_network_is_loopback
fields.description: Valid for stream_connect, datagram_connect, raw_data, outbound_icmp and stream_statistics. Indicates whether or not both sides of a connection are on the same host. Always false for mac and linux.

fields.name: action_socket_type
fields.description: 0 : Unknown type, 1 : Stream, 2 : Datagram, 3 : Raw

fields.name: action_pkts_received
fields.description: Total number of packets received so far from the destination to the source.

fields.name: action_pkts_sent
fields.description: Total number of packets sent so far from the source to the destination.

fields.name: action_powered_off
fields.description: True, if the computer is powered off, such as suspended or hibernated, and false otherwise.

fields.name: action_process_causality_id
fields.description: Causality ID of the terminated process.

fields.name: action_process_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) from which this process started. including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: action_process_file_create_time
fields.description: Creation time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_process_file_info
fields.description: Metadata from the exe file of the process.

fields.name: action_process_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modification time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_process_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file involved in the process in bytes.

fields.name: action_process_image_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: action_process_image_command_line_indices
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: action_process_image_extension
fields.description: Process image extension - File extension

fields.name: action_process_image_md5
fields.description: MD5 of the binary.

fields.name: action_process_image_name
fields.description: File name of the 'action_process_image_path'.

fields.name: action_process_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the process execution.

fields.name: action_process_image_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: action_process_instance_execution_time
fields.description: Instance execution time.

fields.name: action_process_instance_id
fields.description: Cortex instance ID of the process.

fields.name: action_process_integrity_level
fields.description: Integrity level of the process created.

fields.name: action_process_is_causality_root
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the created process is a new causality root process.

fields.name: action_process_is_replay
fields.description: Windows: The following events are replayed: Processes started before the agent is started. Module load events for modules loaded in replayed processes. Drivers loaded using module load before the agent is started. For loaded drivers, the process is always a special KernelProcess.

fields.name: action_process_is_special
fields.description: Indicates special system processes: RegularProcess = 0, KernelProcess = 1, AppContainerProcess = 2, NonWin32SubsystemProcess = 3

fields.name: action_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the new process

fields.name: action_process_remote_session_ip
fields.description: Windows: When the process was started from a remote Terminal Services session, the IP address of the remote client connected to the session.

fields.name: action_process_requested_parent_iid
fields.description: Windows: Same as the action_process_requested_parent_pid, but the instance ID.

fields.name: action_process_requested_parent_pid
fields.description: Windows: A parent process can request to set the parent-pid of the child process to something other than their own. This is used for a runas scenario where the os_actor is different from the actor. Yet, it can also be used by malware to fake the parent pid. This field gives the requested parent pid, while giving the true actor/os_actor for the operation.

fields.name: action_process_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: action_process_signature_status
fields.description: Signature status of the process: Signed = 1, SignedInvalid = 2, Unsigned = 3, FailedToObtain = 4, WeakHash = 5, where the MD5 is used as the hash algorithm. Unsupported = 6, which means the signature was not calculated. InvalidCVE2020_0601 = 7, which means the executable is malicious and is trying to exploit the windows vulnerability CVE2020-0601. Deleted = 8, which means that the file was deleted by the time the agent tried to calculate the signature.

fields.name: action_process_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: action_process_termination_code
fields.description: Process exit code.

fields.name: action_process_termination_date
fields.description: Instance termination time.

fields.name: action_process_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: action_process_username
fields.description: Name assigned to the 'action_process_user_sid'.

fields.name: action_process_pe_load_info
fields.description: Windows: Information about the loaded PE image.

fields.name: action_process_token
fields.description: Security context of the process.

fields.name: action_process_privileges
fields.description: String representing a 64-bit integer. These are the enabled special privileges that the process is running with.

fields.name: action_process_fds
fields.description: Unix: FD information about 'stdin', 'stdout', and 'stderr'.

fields.name: action_process_is_container_root
fields.description: Linux: True for the process that creates the container.

fields.name: action_process_ns_pid
fields.description: The PID of the new process in the relevant Linux namespace.

fields.name: action_process_ns_user_sid
fields.description: Linux-only: Effective UID of the executed binary in the relevant Linux namespace.

fields.name: action_process_ns_user_real_sid
fields.description: Linux-only: Real UID of the executed binary in the relevant Linux namespace.

fields.name: action_process_static_analysis_score
fields.description: Static analysis score of executed binary. Scale of 0-1, where 0 is definitely benign, and 1 is definitely malware.

fields.name: action_process_container_id
fields.description: Linux: The ID of the container in which this process is running.

fields.name: action_process_user_real_sid
fields.description: Unix-only: Real UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: action_process_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the PE or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: action_process_file_access_time
fields.description: Access time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_process_cwd
fields.description: Working directory from which the process was executed.

fields.name: action_process_is_64bit
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process is 64 bit.

fields.name: action_process_is_native
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this process is a 'native process'. On a 32-bit machine, the value is always true, and on a 64-bit machine, the value is true when the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: action_process_peb
fields.description: Windows: The address of the PEB of the process.

fields.name: action_process_peb32
fields.description: Windows: The address of the PEB32 of the process. Only non-zero if this is a WOW64 process.

fields.name: action_process_image_auth_sha1
fields.description: SHA1 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_process_image_auth_sha2
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_process_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Instance ID of the actor that wrote the file for this process.

fields.name: action_process_script
fields.description: When the executable is an interpreter, the script that it is executing.

fields.name: action_process_script_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) from which this script was executed.

fields.name: action_process_environment_variables
fields.description: Envrionment variables that were sent on the process execution.

fields.name: action_protocol
fields.description: IP protocol of the network event.

fields.name: action_proxy
fields.description: Indicates whether or not Cortex XDR/XSIAM performed an HTTP proxy resolution to get these fields: action_external_hostname, action_external_port. If true, the hostname/port fields are taken from the HTTP packet data. Otherwise, they are taken from other protocols like DNS.

fields.name: action_registry_data
fields.description: Registry data being written to the specific key.

fields.name: action_registry_file_path
fields.description: Four operations: Load, Save, Restore, Unload

fields.name: action_registry_key_name
fields.description: Registry key name being accessed.

fields.name: action_registry_old_data
fields.description: Registry data being replaced by a new value.

fields.name: action_registry_old_key_name
fields.description: Old registry key name that is being renamed.

fields.name: action_registry_return_val
fields.description: Return value from the registry operation.

fields.name: action_registry_value_name
fields.description: Registry value name being accessed.

fields.name: action_registry_value_type
fields.description: Regular types: REG_SZ (1), REG_EXPAND_SZ (2), REG_BINARY (3), REG_DWORD (4), REG_DWORD_BIG_ENDIAN (5), REG_LINK (6), REG_MULTI_SZ (7), REG_RESOURCE_LIST (8), REG_FULL_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTOR (9), REG_RESOURCE_REQUIREMENTS_LIST (10), REG_QWORD (11)

fields.name: action_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: action_remote_ip_int
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: action_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: action_remote_process_causality_id
fields.description: Causality ID of the remote injected process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_file_access_time
fields.description: Access time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_extension
fields.description: Process image extension - File extension.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_md5
fields.description: MD5 of the binary.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_name
fields.description: Image name of the remote injected process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the execution.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: action_remote_process_instance_id
fields.description: Instance ID of the remote injected process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_integrity_level
fields.description: Integrity level of the remote injected process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_is_causality_root
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the remote process being injected into is a causality root.

fields.name: action_remote_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the remote process

fields.name: action_remote_process_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: action_remote_process_signature_status
fields.description: Signature status of the process: Signed = 1, SignedInvalid = 2, Unsigned = 3, FailedToObtain = 4, WeakHash = 5, where the MD5 is used as the hash algorithm. Unsupported = 6, which means the signature was not calculated. InvalidCVE2020_0601 = 7, which means the executable is malicious and is trying to exploit the windows vulnerability CVE2020-0601. Deleted = 8, which means that the file was deleted by the time the agent tried to calculate the signature.

fields.name: action_remote_process_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: action_remote_process_thread_id
fields.description: Target thread of remote execution.

fields.name: action_remote_process_thread_start_address
fields.description: Memory address of the thread being injected into a remote process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: action_remote_process_username
fields.description: Name assigned to the action_process_user_sid field.

fields.name: action_remote_process_file_info
fields.description: Metadata from the EXE file of the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_file_create_time
fields.description: Creation time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modification time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the PE or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: action_remote_process_is_special
fields.description: Indicates special system processes: RegularProcess = 0, KernelProcess = 1, AppContainerProcess = 2, NonWin32SubsystemProcess = 3

fields.name: action_remote_process_is_replay
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the agent was alive during the execution of the process.

fields.name: action_remote_process_is_64bit
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process is 64 bit.

fields.name: action_remote_process_is_native
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this process is a 'native process'. On a 32-bit machine, the value is always true, and on a 64-bit machine, the value is true when the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: action_remote_process_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file of the process in bytes.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_auth_sha1
fields.description: SHA1 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_remote_process_image_auth_sha2
fields.description: Process image SHA-2 authenticode.

fields.name: action_remote_process_last_writer_actor
fields.description: The instance ID of the last writer that changed the file of the process.

fields.name: action_rpc_func_opnum
fields.description: Integer identifying the function called.

fields.name: action_rpc_interface_uuid
fields.description: Universally Unique IDentifier (UUID) identifying the interface. An interface is only uniquely identified by the UUID + Major version + Minor version.

fields.name: action_rpc_interface_version_major
fields.description: Major version of the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) interface.

fields.name: action_rpc_interface_version_minor
fields.description: Minor version of the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) interface.

fields.name: action_rpc_items
fields.description: EAL remote procedure call (RPC) data items.

fields.name: action_rpc_func_exception_code
fields.description: If an exception occurred during this remote procedure call (RPC), the exception code is provided. Otherwise, the value is 0.

fields.name: action_rpc_interface_name
fields.description: Description of the remote procedure call (RPC) interface, taken from the IDL file.

fields.name: action_rpc_func_str_call_fields
fields.description: Parameters where the keys are the names of the argument in the function call. The values are the values of the parameters. Values are strings. For instance, if we have a remote procedure call (RPC) to CreateService(ServiceName, ServiceType), we will get something like { 'ServiceName': 'MyServiceName1', 'ServiceType': '3'}.

fields.name: action_rpc_func_name
fields.description: Function name taken from the IDL file.

fields.name: action_rpc_func_int_call_fields
fields.description: Same as the field action_rpc_func_str_call_fields, but the values are integers. Since the values are in a uint64_t format, they are still serialized as strings.

fields.name: action_session_duration
fields.description: Number of milliseconds (ms) since the session started.

fields.name: action_syscall_etw_based
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the system call based on Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) or on native hooking.

fields.name: action_syscall_int_params
fields.description: Action parameters where the value is an integer in the system call invocation.

fields.name: action_syscall_stack_ptr
fields.description: Stack pointer creating the captured syscall.

fields.name: action_syscall_string_params
fields.description: Action parameters where the value is a string in the system call invocation.

fields.name: action_syscall_target_image_name
fields.description: Base image name of the target process, such as lsass.exe.

fields.name: action_syscall_target_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the execution.

fields.name: action_syscall_target_instance_id
fields.description: Instance ID of the target process, when one exists.

fields.name: action_syscall_target_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the syscall target process

fields.name: action_syscall_target_thread_id
fields.description: Target thread ID of the captured syscall.

fields.name: action_thread_thread_id
fields.description: Thread ID creating the captured syscall.

fields.name: action_thread_start_address
fields.description: Start address of the thread function, which is serialized as a string as it can be a true 64-bit address.

fields.name: action_thread_parent_pid
fields.description: Windows: Same as the actor info.

fields.name: action_thread_parent_tid
fields.description: Windows: Same as the actor info.

fields.name: action_thread_parent_iid
fields.description: Windows: Same as the actor info.

fields.name: action_thread_stack_base
fields.description: Windows: Base of the stack.

fields.name: action_thread_stack_limit
fields.description: Windows: Limit of the stack.

fields.name: action_thread_teb
fields.description: Windows: Address of the TEB of the thread.

fields.name: action_total_download
fields.description: Total number of payload bytes from the destination to the source so far.

fields.name: action_total_upload
fields.description: Total number of payload bytes from the source to the destination so far.

fields.name: action_upload
fields.description: Number of uploaded bytes in the last time window.

fields.name: action_user_agent
fields.description: The user agent used by an actor to perform an action.

fields.name: action_user_is_local_session
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user log in from a remote computer or locally.

fields.name: action_user_status
fields.description: Agent user status change event. Enum mapping: 1 - logon, 2 - logoff, 3 - locked / screen saver on, 4 - unlocked / screen saver off, 5 - Reconnect, 6 - Disconnect

fields.name: action_user_status_sid
fields.description: Security identifier (SID) of the user.

fields.name: action_username
fields.description: Name of the user.

fields.name: action_user_session_id
fields.description: Windows: Session ID of the process.

fields.name: action_category_of_app_id
fields.description: App-ID category.

fields.name: action_sub_category_of_app_id
fields.description: App-ID sub category.

fields.name: action_app_id_risk
fields.description: App-ID risk

fields.name: action_location
fields.description: Geolocation information of the source IP.

fields.name: action_as_data
fields.description: ASN data from the source of the network activity.

fields.name: action_evtlog_normalized_user
fields.description: A normalized user for the event log event.

fields.name: action_file_pe_info
fields.description: Only valid according to collection policy. Usually, enabled on some write-file events. The field is not aptly named since it sometimes contains info on non-PE files as well.

fields.name: action_file_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Instance ID of the actor that wrote the file.

fields.name: action_file_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the PE or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: action_file_auth_sha1
fields.description: SHA1 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_file_auth_sha2
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary's Authenticode, which is the part of a PE used when signing.

fields.name: action_file_reparse_count
fields.description: Only valid for sub_type = 1/2 (create_new/open), which provides the reparse count if the file was open through a reparse point.

fields.name: action_file_pipe_impersonation_integrity_level
fields.description: When the event type is impersonate_pipe, this field contains the integrity level of the token that is used for the impersonation.

fields.name: action_file_operation_flags
fields.description: The specified flags for the file operation.

fields.name: action_file_is_anonymous
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the file was created without an accesible path from the filesystem (`open(..., O_TMPFILE)`, `memfd_create`).

fields.name: action_mount_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW).

fields.name: action_process_handle_is_kernel
fields.description: Indicates whether or not a handle is used by the kernel.

fields.name: action_process_handle_granted_access
fields.description: Access rights that were granted when opening the handle.

fields.name: action_process_handle_opened_process_pid
fields.description: PID of the process opened.

fields.name: action_process_handle_opened_process_iid
fields.description: IID of the process opened.

fields.name: address_mapping
fields.description: symbol_name: Name of the suspicious function. image_path: Path of the image containing the function or image injected to. index: By default, set to 1. In Syscall events, points to a function parameter number.

fields.name: action_ns_flags
fields.description: Unshare: Flags raw value. Setns: nstype raw value.

fields.name: action_ns_path
fields.description: Setns-only: Path to the namespace file descriptor.

fields.name: action_time_change_clock_diff_ms
fields.description: Difference in milliseconds from previous system time.

fields.name: action_trace_flags
fields.description: Flags that were sent to the ptrace function.

fields.name: action_trace_ret
fields.description: Return value of the ptrace function.

fields.name: action_trace_request_id
fields.description: Request ID of the ptrace function.
